item.title: Image-based tracking of instruments of a laparoscopic manipulator system
item.description: Abstract For avoiding collision while operating with articulate laparoscopic manipulator system, the position of the instruments should be provided in real-time. Our proposed method provides a reasonable solution for instrument tracking in vivo.
